content:
# HyperCode Roadmap

## NOW (This Week - 2025-12-03)

-   [x] T-001: Set up project management structure ‚Üí Completed 2025-12-03, @system
-   [x] T-002: Visual Programming Interface ‚Üí In progress, @user
-   [x] T-003: Define core language syntax ‚Üí In review, @user
-   [ ] T-004: Documentation structure overhaul ‚Üí In progress, @system

## NEXT (This Month - December 2025)

-   [ ] T-010: Create basic interpreter prototype ‚Üí Planned
-   [ ] T-011: Design neurodivergent-friendly syntax ‚Üí Planned
-   [ ] T-012: Implement documentation automation ‚Üí Planned
-   [ ] T-013: Set up CI/CD for documentation ‚Üí Planned

## UPCOMING (Q1 2026)

-   [ ] T-020: AI integration layer ‚Üí Research phase
-   [ ] T-021: Quantum computing abstraction ‚Üí Research phase
-   [ ] T-022: VS Code extension development ‚Üí Planned
-   [ ] T-023: Community documentation portal ‚Üí Planned

## FUTURE (2026+)

-   [ ] T-100: Version 1.0 Release
-   [ ] T-101: Community growth initiatives
-   [ ] T-102: Enterprise features

---

### How to Contribute

1. Pick an unassigned task or propose a new one
2. Comment on the issue to claim it
3. Submit a pull request with your changes
4. Request review from the core team

### Legend

-   ‚úÖ Done
-   üîÑ In Progress
-   ‚è≥ Planned
-   üí° Research Phase
